mapper.select: select * from publish order by id desc
select * from publish p where p.creator=#{createId}
mapper.update: update publish p set p.tag=#{tag},p.description=#{description},p.title=#{title},p.gmt_modified=#{gmtModified} where p.id =#{id}
update publish set view_count=view_count+1 where id=#{id}
update publish set comment_count=comment_count+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from publish p where p.id!=#{id} and p.tag regexp #{tag}
